item.title: Definitions and initializations in C++
item.description: When reviewing an incoming C++ PR last week, I left a comment along the lines: “merge local variable declaration with its initialization”. But why? Is this just a stylistic issue or is there something deeper to warrant making the change? Let’s look at stack frames, C, and then C++ to answer these questions.
